headline: Figma draws 'neutral' ratings as Wall Street flags lofty valuation, rising competition
summary: (Reuters) -Wall Street brokerages on Monday started their coverage of Figma (FIG) with neutral ratings, as they weighed the design software maker's lofty valuation amid stiff competition against its potential for artificial intelligence-driven growth.

headline: Jeffrey Katzenberg talks AI in media, Disney, Netflix, Skydance
summary: WndrCo founding partner and Nova Sky Stories board member and strategic adviser Jeffrey Katzenberg weighs in on the state of the media space as an industry veteran who was a co-founder of DreamWorks, former CEO of DreamWorks Animation, and chairman of Walt Disney Studios. Check out Yahoo Finance's full interview with Nova Sky Stories co-founder and CEO Kimbal Musk and WndrCo founding partner Jeffrey Katzenberg. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
